context: I was so sad when Alan Rickman died. What were some of the movies he was in?
Sure, Alan Rickman starred in The Wildest Dream and Unforgivable Blackness.
Who else was in Unforgivable Blackness?
In Unforgivable Blackness starring Derek Jacobi and Courtney B. Vance
Courtney B. Vance...I'm thinking he was in something else I've seen. What else has he been in?
He is starring in The Preacher's Wife and in The Last Supper
That's right! He is good. Can you put Unforgivable Blackness on my Watch List?
resp: Sure, Unforgivable Blackness is added to my Watch List.

context.content: "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" follows the misadventures of an ordinary human, Arthur Dent, who is swept off Earth just before it is demolished to make way for a hyperspace bypass. He embarks on a journey through space with an eclectic group of companions, encountering bizarre and humorous situations along the way. The main theme revolves around the absurdity of life, the universe, and everything in between, all presented with a delightful blend of humor and wit.
That sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about the comedic and dramatic elements in the movie? I want to make sure it covers all the genres I'm looking for.

context.content: Certainly! "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" is known for its clever and witty humor, often incorporating absurd and surreal elements. The comedic aspects are prominent throughout the story, offering lighthearted and humorous moments. At the same time, the movie also delves into thought-provoking and intense themes, adding a layer of drama and depth to the narrative. It strikes a balance between comedy and drama, creating a unique and engaging experience for the audience.
